An idea for a move for a hypothetical &quot;Ooze&quot; playbook.<br /><br />---<br /><br />Gelatinous Form<br /><br />When you use you&#39;re gelatinous form to slink past an obstacle or attack, roll 2d+Dex.<br /><br />On a 10+, you slosh through it unscathed.<br />On a 7-9, a Glob flies off you. Take 4 damage.<br /><br />When you reabsorb a Glob back into you, heal 4 damage.<br />
<div id='comment z13jcr2jntnkfxqac04cc1baevv0zvhyo2s'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/101199869016634749008_photo.jpg'> Asbjørn H Flø</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-07-26 19:51:44 (edited: 2018-07-26 19:51:44)</cite></p>
        <p>Check out the compendium class The Blob. It&#39;s an &quot;official&quot; compendium class made by the authors. <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzeF5GXNEsnfWFhFWHBNQ05TVm8/view" class="ot-anchor">https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzeF5GXNEsnfWFhFWHBNQ05TVm8/view</a><br /><a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzeF5GXNEsnfWFhFWHBNQ05TVm8/view" data-embed="" data-attachment-render-hint="1" class="ot-anchor">https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzeF5GXNEsnfWFhFWHBNQ05TVm8/view</a></p>
